dialogue: You asked for a breakdown of what I did this month.
I wasted 25% of my time in useless meetings.
I spent 33% of my time listening to co-workers complain about other co-workers.
I used 11% to resend files I already sent.
14% went to dealing with a rumor you started by accident.
16% went toward working on the wrong things because you communicate poorly.
What did you do with the 1% that was left?
